en.title: Additional Documents
en.youNeed: Please upload any additional documents that should accompany this application(s) form(s).
en.youNeed2: Examples of additional documents can be found on the application form
en.youNeed3: Please upload each document separately by using the “upload” button
en.youNeed4: You can post or email your documents to the court. Copies of certificates must be certified, which means they must be signed and dated by a professional person such as a solicitor or doctor.
uploadRequirement: File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
You can’t upload executable(.exe) .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

additionalApplicationUpload.sizeError: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
additionalApplicationUpload.formatError: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, Ms Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
additionalApplicationUpload.totalFilesExceededError: You can upload 20 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
additionalApplicationUpload.noFileUploadError: Please choose a file to upload

cy.title: Dogfennau ychwanegol
cy.youNeed: Uwchlwythwch unrhyw ddogfennau ychwanegol y dylid eu cynnwys gyda’r ffurflen gais hon/ffurflenni cais hyn.
cy.youNeed2: Gellir dod o hyd i enghreifftiau o ddogfennau ychwanegol ar y ffurflen gais
cy.youNeed3: Uwchlwythwch pob dogfen ar wahân trwy ddefnyddio’r botwm “uwchlwytho”
cy.youNeed4: Gallwch bostio neu anfon eich dogfennau i’r llys drwy e-bost. Rhaid bod copïau o dystygrifau wedi’u hardystio, sy’n golygu bod rhaid iddynt fod wedi’u llofnodi a’i dyddio gan unigolyn proffesiynol fel cyfreithiwr neu feddyg.
uploadRequirement:
Fformatau ffeiliau: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
  • Maint ffeil pob dogfen: hyd at 20 megabyte (MB)
Maint ffeil pob dogfen: hyd at 20 megabyte (MB)
Ni ellir uwchlwytho ffeiliau sydd wedi’u diogelu gan gyfrinai
Ni ellir uwchlwytho ffeiliau (.exe) .zip neu ffeiliau archif eraill oherwydd y risg o feirws.

additionalApplicationUpload.sizeError: Mae’r ffeil yn fwy na 20Mb. Uwchlwythwch ffeil sy’n llai na 20Mb
additionalApplicationUpload.formatError: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn derbyn ffeiliau yn y fformatau canlynol yn unig - Ms Word, Ms Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF
additionalApplicationUpload.totalFilesExceededError: Gallwch uwchlwytho hyd at 20 ffeil yn unig. Dylech ddileu un o’r ffeiliau a uwchlwythwyd a rhoi cynnig arall arni
